pageContent:
Sanjay Hegde – IT Product  Owner / Sr. Solution Architect 
sanjay_hegde@yahoo.com.  
678-234-2017 
SUMMARY 
Sanjay is a Senior IT Product Owner / Sr. Solution Architect in the Contact Center space. For over 20 
years he has been working exclusively on the Oracle CRM application suite and has valuable hands-
on experience through his participation in many engagements across various industries. Sanjay has 
more than 4 years’ experience in SAP - SD. His experience also includes Develop/Maintain Business 
Applications, Customer Support and Quality Assurance. 
 
SKILLS 
Siebel CRM, Solution Architecture, IT Product Owner, Business Analysis, SCRUM, Oracle CRM On 
Demand, Oracle Sales Cloud., Application Development, SDLC, SAFe, Requirement Gathering, Agile 
Methodologies, Process Improvement, Team Leadership, Consulting, Case Management, Business 
Process, Quality Engineering, Data Analysis/Quality, SQL, Performance Testing, Production Support, 
ITSM and Training. 
EXPERIENCE

Process, Quality Engineering, Data Analysis/Quality, SQL, Performance Testing, Production Support, 
ITSM and Training. 
EXPERIENCE  
General Motors – Sr. Solutions Architect / IT Product Owner -  January - 2014 – June - 2023 
• Product owner of 3 Global CRM Contact Center applications in 4 different languages  
• Leading top technical talent from new college hires to senior software engineers 
• Working across multi-functional teams, be comfortable working in a matrixed organization and aligning 
national and international stakeholders 
• Leverage SAFe Agile practices in prioritizing and managing the product backlog across enterprise  
• Work with the business to analyze, prioritize and solution the epics, features, spikes and user stories  
• Work with the scrum masters to backlog refinement, sprint planning and daily scrum  
• Work with the technical team on user stories to establish best practice configuration and delivery

• Work with the scrum masters to backlog refinement, sprint planning and daily scrum  
• Work with the technical team on user stories to establish best practice configuration and delivery 
• Support 3500 advisors worldwide, 60000 Dealer technicians in North America 
• Support / Resolve P1 and P2 incidents generated through central command center within the SLA 
• ITSM - Incident management - P2, P3 and P4 level production Support, Root Cause Analysis 
(RCA),Incident triage and Incident reports  
• Responsible for maintaining application stars yearly – Business Continuity star, Security star, 
Operations readiness star, Technology star 
• Technical / Development Lead for Contact Center application releases 
• Contact Center deployment - Advisors support on floor  
• Lead and support performance testing 
• Support - SIT and UAT issue resolution and bug fixes 
 
Capgemini Consulting – GA. Sr. Techno Functional Analyst.  June – 2012 – January - 2014

• Lead and support performance testing 
• Support - SIT and UAT issue resolution and bug fixes
